allow: Bash(python3 -c " import json with open\(''/Users/gwk/.claude/projects/-Users-gwk-Development-learn-terraform-test-skills-simple-with/df6e0663-9493-4019-aa6f-c79afb79c1c1.jsonl''\) as f: for line in f: obj = json.loads\(line\) if obj.get\(''type''\) == ''assistant'': for msg in \(obj.get\(''message'', {}\).get\(''content'', []\) if isinstance\(obj.get\(''message'', {}\).get\(''content''\), list\) else []\): text = msg.get\(''text'', ''''\) if ''mock_provider'' in text or ''for.*rule'' in text or ''tftest'' in text: # Print chunks around relevant content lines = text.split\(''\\n''\) for i, l in enumerate\(lines\): if any\(kw in l for kw in [''mock_provider'', ''tftest'', ''for '', ''expect_failures'', ''run '', ''assert'']\): start = max\(0, i-2\) end = min\(len\(lines\), i+5\) for ll in lines[start:end]: print\(ll[:200]\) print\(''---''\) ")

Bash(python3 -c " import json with open\(''/Users/gwk/.claude/projects/-Users-gwk-Development-learn-terraform-test-skills-simple-with/df6e0663-9493-4019-aa6f-c79afb79c1c1.jsonl''\) as f: for line in f: obj = json.loads\(line\) if obj.get\(''type''\) == ''assistant'': content = obj.get\(''message'', {}\).get\(''content'', []\) if isinstance\(content, list\): for msg in content: text = msg.get\(''text'', ''''\) if ''mock_provider'' in text and len\(text\) > 500: print\(text[:3000]\) print\(''...''\) break ")
